resources.string: Contact block/unblock options are in top right menu

Ever wanted calls from certain contacts in your phone book to never ring? You now have a solution with this Call Block app.
The Call Block app has two views one for unblocked and another for blocked contacts. The unblocked contacts view displays all your stored contacts whose calls are not blocked, while the blocked view displays stored contacts calls from whom are blocked. To block one or contacts, you simply go to the unblocked view and selected the contacts you want to block. Then using the block option you can block calls from all those contacts with a single tap.
